mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, SUBSTR(REGISTDATE,1,10) as registdate FROM SCUSTOMERBOARD1 WHERE NUM >= (SELECT MAX(NUM) FROM SCUSTOMERBOARD1) - #{NumberOfData} ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS AROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM SCUSTOMERBOARD1 ORDER BY REGISTDATE DESC) A) WHERE AROWNUM >= #{IndexBegin} AND AROWNUM <= #{IndexEnd} ORDER BY REGISTDATE DESC
